alert.note: Alert for Colquitt (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 1:17PM EDT until March 25 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM EDT FOR COLQUITT COUNTY... At 117 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Riverside, or near Moultrie, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Moultrie, Norman Park, Riverside, Schley, Berlin, Funston, Ellenton, Cool Spring, Pineboro, Center Hill, Spence Airport, South Moultrie, Sigsbee, Moultrie Municipal A/P, Crosland, New Elm and Bay. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
